src:
Daftar 3 Tim Lolos Babak 16 Besar Liga Champions
07 Nov 2019, 05:35 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


PSG lolos babak 16 besar Liga Champions. (AP Photo/Thibault Camus)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Sebanyak tiga tim sudah memastikan lolos ke babak 16 besarÂ Liga Champions setelah meraih kemenangan di laga keempat fase grup, Kamis (7/11) dini hari WIB.Tim yang berhak lolos ke babak 16 besar saat ini adalah para juara grup di daftar klasemen sementara. Klub-klub ini sudah tak terkejar kontestan lainnya atau minimal sudah mengunci posisi runner up jika disalip satu tim di bawahnya.Juventus mengamankan satu tiket ke babak 16 besar usai mengalahkan Lokomotiv Moskow 2-1. Gol telat Douglas Costa di masa injury time memupus harapan Lokomotiv untuk mendapat poin.Tambahan tiga poin membuat Juventus tak tergoyahkan di puncak klasemen Grup D dengan koleksi 10 poin. Satu tempat tersisa akan diperebutkan Atletico Madrid, Lokomotiv, dan Bayer Leverkusen.Saat ini, Atletico berada di posisi runner up dengan koleksi tujuh poin. Sementara Lokomotiv masing-masing mengemas tiga poin dengan dua pertandingan tersisa.Bayern Munchen jadi tim kedua yang lolos ke babak 16 besar usai meraup kemenangan 2-0 saat menjamu Olympiakos Piraeus. Ini menjadi kemenang keempat beruntun Die Roten.Munchen berhak menguasai puncak klasemen dengan torehan 12 poin. Sementara satu tiket tersisa akan diperebutkan Tottenham dan Red Star Belgrade.Dari Grup A, Paris Saint-Germain juga sukses mengantongi tiket lolos ke babak 16 besar. PSG juga meraup hasil sempurna dari empat pertandingan dengan perolehan 12 poin.Les Parisiens kini berada di puncak klasemen dengan keunggulan lima poin dari Real Madrid yang berada di posisi kedua. Madrid berpeluang mengikuti jejak PSG, namun mereka setidaknya harus meraih satu kemenangan atau minimal imbang lawan Brugge.Tiga tim yang sudah lolos ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions:1. Juventus2. Bayern Munchen3. Paris Saint-Germain (jun)
text:
List of 3 Team Qualifying for the Round of 16 of the Champions League
Nov 7 2019, 05:35 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


PSG qualifies for the last 16 of the Champions League. (AP Photo / Thibault Camus)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - As many as three teams have confirmed qualification for the last 16 of the Champions League after winning in the fourth match of the group phase on Thursday (7/11) early morning hrs. The team entitled to qualify for the last 16 is currently the champions group in the standings list. These clubs are not overtaken by other contestants or at least have locked the runner-up position if overtaken by one team underneath. Juventus secured a ticket to the round of 16 after defeating Lokomotiv Moscow 2-1. Douglas Costa's late goal in injury time dashed Lokomotiv's hopes of getting points. The addition of three points makes Juventus unshakable at the top of Group D with a collection of 10 points. One place left will be contested by Atletico Madrid, Lokomotiv and Bayer Leverkusen. At present, Atletico are in the runner-up position with a collection of seven points. While Lokomotiv each pack three points with two matches remaining. West Munchen became the second team to qualify for the last 16 after scooping a 2-0 victory at home to Olympiakos Piraeus. This is the fourth successive win Die Roten. Munchen has the right to master the top of the standings with a notch 12 points. While the remaining tickets will be contested Tottenham and Red Star Belgrade. From Group A, Paris Saint-Germain also successfully pocketed tickets to qualify for the round of 16. PSG also earned perfect results from four matches with the acquisition of 12 points. Les Parisiens is now at the top of the standings with a five-point advantage from Real Madrid who are second. Madrid has the opportunity to follow in the footsteps of PSG, but they have to win at least one victory or at least a draw against Brugge. Three teams that have qualified for the last 16 of the Champions League: 1. Juventus2. Bayern Munchen3. Paris Saint-Germain (jun)
